OrgName.entry: REVITALISING ECCLESFIELD PARK AND PAVILION GROUP

Desc.entry: Aims to revatalise the park and pavillion, creating a focal point for the village and ensuring a safe, tranquil and fun environment. Seeks to identify the needs of the community in relation to sports, leisure facilities, the commuity building and a meeting space. Fundraises to improve the park and pavilion. Aims to promote commuity cohesion, improve the health and well-being of the community by increasing sports and leisure activities/opportunities. Maintains and promotes the community orchard and seeks to develop awareness/education of the park's heritage and natural environment.
